### Backup

\begin{examples}

1. Linear regression: $Y = a + b_1^TX + b_2^TX + \epsilon$

2. NonLinear regression: $Y = a + \exp(b_1^TX) + \sin(b_2^TX) + \epsilon$

3. More general: $Y = f(b_1^TX, b_2^TX, \epsilon)$
\end{examples}
